title: Ashley Gordon
text:
Ashley Gordon is a former professional <a href="Indigenous%20Australian">Indigenous Australian</a> <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played in the 1980s and 1990s as a er and for the <a href="Newcastle%20Knights">Newcastle Knights</a> and <a href="Penrith%20Panthers">Penrith Panthers</a> in the <a href="National%20Rugby%20League">NRL</a>. Gordon was recognised in 1990 as the best wing of the year winning the Dally M Winger Of The Year.
Gordon is the second cousin of <a href="Cronulla-Sutherland%20Sharks">Cronulla-Sutherland Sharks</a> winger <a href="Isaac%20Gordon">Isaac Gordon</a>.
Background.
Gordon was born in <a href="Brewarrina">Brewarrina</a>, <a href="New%20South%20Wales">New South Wales</a>. Gordon played junior rugby league at Cardiff, before moving to Souths Newcastle.
Playing career.
Gordon played for the <a href="Newcastle%20Knights">Newcastle Knights</a> for most of his career doing them proud. Gordon then played for the <a href="Penrith%20Panthers">Penrith Panthers</a> for a year and came back to the Knights for a farewell year.
